projects.name: ProJet
projects.description: A platform where users can upload and showcase all their projects in one place. It also allows them to explore projects from others, encouraging collaboration and learning.

projects.name: FileGlide
projects.description: An easy-to-use platform for quick and secure file sharing, allowing instant sharing across devices without needing to log in or sign up.

projects.name: Diskord
projects.description: A chat app featuring secure login, separate room chats, and an AI chat powered by Gemini for smart conversations.
